label: Meets coverage?
tooltip: >1 read contributed to the assembled contig and >30% of the query sequence length is covered by the reference sequence identified

label: Reads
tooltip: Number of quality filtered reads that mapped to the contig

label: % Reads
tooltip: Percentage of quality filtered reads that mapped to the contig

label: Mean depth
tooltip: Average depth of coverage across the contig

label: % Coverage at 30X
tooltip: Percentage of the contig that is covered by at least 30 reads

label: Mean mapping quality
tooltip: Average mapping quality of the reads that mapped to the contig

label: Normalised confidence score
tooltip: The normalised confidence score is a value between 0 and 1 that is calculated by normalising the confidence score to the maximum possible score for this sequence. A value of 1 indicates the sequence with highest confidence
